item.title: Fcuk yo couch! (funny video)
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

exe626:

We aren’t talking about the original video, we’re talking about the Youtube shit he linked us to. God damn, why would that even affect how you see this?

/facepalm

We don’t have to be talking about the original video. The fact remains that the video that we are talking about is just a small part of another, longer video. Since the longer video as a whole is funny, the small excerpt that we’re discussing is funny too. Does that make sense to you?

item.title: Fcuk yo couch! (funny video)
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:11, topic:164599”][quote author=Schizzo link=topic=223457.msg1931555#msg1931555 date=1197725891]
Whether or not something is funny is a matter of opinion. If you don’t think it’s funny then that’s fine, insulting other people because they think it is doesn’t help anything. Another reason why it might not be amusing to you is if you don’t know why he was saying it. That small clip was a part of a skit by Dave Chappelle, they person who made that video edited it so it was like a song.
[/quote]No shit Sherlock. In now way is it funny in a matter of speaking, only to those who find the word “fuck” enjoyable and amusing would find it funny. Dave Chappelle is funny and all, but this is just a horrid piece of work.
Do YOU find it funny?[/quote]

No, I don’t find the word “fuck” funny. I was saying that I thought that skit was funny. As I stated, the video linked to was just a small part of a 30 minute+ skit. I happen to own the DVD with the entire skit (along with the rest of Chappelle’s show) on it. That’s what I was saying was funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Fcuk yo couch! (funny video)
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:6, topic:164599”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=223457.msg1930625#msg1930625 date=1197686489]
That isn’t funny. Notice how only the children of the forums think it is.
“oh me gee he sed fuck!” giggle
[/quote]
I agree, what’s so funny about a black man sitting on a couch saying “Fuck your couch,”.
I bet if a white guy said “Fuck your couch cracker, fuck your couch,” you wouldn’t be laughing. I would get more kick’s out of seeing a rabbit twitching at me.[/quote]

Then take exe’s balls out of your mouth and go watch a twitching rabbit. The video has nothing to do with race, stop being a presumptuous idiot.

[quote=“exe626, post:5, topic:164599”]That isn’t funny. Notice how only the children of the forums think it is.
“oh me gee he sed fuck!” giggle[/quote]

Whether or not something is funny is a matter of opinion. If you don’t think it’s funny then that’s fine, insulting other people because they think it is doesn’t help anything. Another reason why it might not be amusing to you is if you don’t know why he was saying it. That small clip was a part of a skit by Dave Chappelle, they person who made that video edited it so it was like a song.

Read full topic
